'''Pot''' may refer to:

==''Minecraft''==
=== Blocks ===
* {{BlockLink|Decorated Pot}}, a storage block that holds [[item]]s.
** Crafted from any combination of [[pottery sherd]]s and [[brick]]s.
* {{BlockLink|Flower Pot}}, a decorative block that holds [[plant]]s, [[mushroom]]s, and [[Nether fungi]].
** Crafted from bricks.
* {{BlockLink|Cauldron}}, a block that holds most liquids.
** Crafted from [[iron ingot]]s.

=== Items ===
* {{ItemLink|Water Bottle}} &mdash; a bottle that holds water. <!-- Same reason as honey -->
** Crafted from [[glass]].
* {{ItemLink|Honey Bottle}} &mdash; a bottle that holds honey.<!--Included because some people might confuse it for a honey pot; also, it is very similar to a potion, and potions are included on this page.-->
* {{ItemLink|Potion}}, {{ItemLink|Splash Potion}}, or {{ItemLink|Lingering Potion}} &mdash; an item that applies [[effect]]s when {{ctrl|used}}.
** Effects applied through [[brewing]].
